---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence for the detection of vertebral fractures on plain spinal radiography"
excerpt: "Vertebral fractures (VFs) cause serious problems, such as substantial functional loss and a high mortality rate, and a delayed diagnosis may further worsen the prognosis. Plain thoracolumbar radiography (PTLR) is an essential method for the evaluation of VFs."
